Ce jeu est clairement devenu un paye tout win.

 Un gameplay qui 'pourrait être bien' mais qui est gâché par des tueurs pouvant camper, problème jamais réfléchis pour être corrigé. 

D'autant plus que les hitboxs sont de plus en plus abominables. Des tueurs ayant le droit canaliser leur capacité spéciale à l'INFINI pouvant tout autant courser le joueur que l'OS avec cette capacité. 

Le jour ou le jeu sera repris par des passionnés et non des bisness man alors là nous pourrons voir les solutions simples à mettre en place.

Way better game than before. Maps are being reworked so they don't look right out of 1998. Many QoL improvements for perks, killers powers, cosmetics etc. Queue times are better too.

Très bon jeu, mais assez dépendant de la qualité du Tueur :
- Sera-t-il bon joueur,, à poursuivre les joueurs équitablement ?
- 0u fera-t-il du (face)camp ou du focus ?
Le fun d'une partie sera très dépendant de cela, et il y a des soirs où on regrette d'avoir lancé le jeu tant les adversaires étaient tous insupportables.
Au pire, dans ce cas là, jouez Tueur.

如果你还在踌躇、犹豫，信我买就完了，杀机绝对不会让你失望的。在我看来，它绝对是一款无论打不打折，都值得入的游戏，更何况现在夏促也没剩几天了，32入不香吗？
当然，如果你是第一次接触这个游戏的萌萌新，我有几点建议，如下：
1.在游玩前，我非常推荐先观看如拒绝、付导、离枯等等主播的游戏视频及直播，会对你刚游玩这个游戏有非常非常非常大的帮助，多看看，了解游戏的各种机制思路等等。
2.有不懂的地方就去百度或者各大qq群问和查。
3.熟悉了解各种技能，包括屠夫和人类的，在百度各大贴吧都可以查看，游戏内也可以，能对你的游戏体验有极大帮助。
4.杀机内置的教程（就是文字的那个教程）个人推荐看一看，也很有帮助，这和第一条配合使用，文字描述和实战演示结合，可以让你很快明白。
5.新手推荐入的DLC： 如果你主玩人：麦叔dlc（戴个白色面具的)、阿通（凛）dlc（光着屁股 
                                    那个）、魔王dlc（脸上长菊花的）
                                    如果你主玩屠夫：小丑dlc（大肚子的肥宅）、麦叔dlc、瘟疫dlc（拿着 
                                    香炉的）、弗莱迪dlc（梦境仙女）。
6.一定要多练多玩，杀机并不是一款简单的游戏，它需要团队合作，大局观，板区博弈等等等诸多技巧和方法，这些很多都需要自己摸索，光看别人玩，脑子会手可不是这么想的。
7.一些最好去遵守的原则：1.最好不要贴脸收尸，连救下来的机会都不给，最好可以砍救的人，换人挂，都是比较好的做法，可以针对（现在黎明竞速不针对，很难打）。
                                           2.萌新有害怕的心理很正常，但是这毕竟只是个游戏，不要怕死，不要不敢修机，要勇敢救人（但一定不要拿队友刷分，如果你这么做是肯定上不了段的），不要还剩3人3机或2机，就躲起来等队友死，自己走地窖，能救一定要去救队友，如果一个2挂队友要倒了，而你一次没挂过或只挂过一次，去保护队友，必要时把自己卖了，都是对整个游戏和其他队友很大的帮助，杀机三个人和4个人真的是俩个游戏。
以上，是我对萌新的一些建议，如有错误或不妥，别喷我（卑微）。

Incredibly fun and the perfect mix of horror and teamwork. Great game for playing on your own or inviting all your friends to join in. Rewards skill and communication between players keeping the game free to play for those looking for a game they don't have to spend any extra cash on.

Dead by Daylight is one of the best multiplayer survival horror games out on the market. You can play it solo or with friends. You have a variety of survivors and killers to choose from each with their own unique set of 3 perks. Each match you play you earn bloodpoints that you can use to unlock items and more perks through your bloodweb. Every time you rank up your player level you earn iridescent shards, which can be used towards unlocking unique perks in the Shrine of Secrets (updated weekly/located in the game store), unlocking other characters, or cosmetics.

 Your primary objective as survivor is to fix 5 generators with your team, activate the 2 exit gates, and escape. You have secondary objectives which are cleansing dull totems/hex totems (which are little skeleton heads you see around the match; hex totems are on fire), saving survivors from hooks/healing them, winning chases and escaping the killer. Since you can't attack the killer, the best way to escape is through evasion, looping, pallet stuns, and flashlight stuns. Survivors also have items they can bring into a match: First-Aid Kit, Tool-Box, Flashlight, Keys, and Maps. Even though the game is repetitive, you have tons of maps to explore, and plenty of survivors to learn their individual perks. Most recently they incorporated a battle pass which offers new challenges to complete in order to unlock the rewards.

Your primary objective as killer is to hunt down survivors, injure them with your primary or secondary attacks, kick generators to regress their progress, and sacrifice as many survivors as you can to the entity. Killers really do not have any secondary objective besides preventing generator progression through map pressure and hooking survivors. The best way to find survivors is by utilizing your killer perks to hinder survivors ability to complete their objective. Some of the best perks will be perks that slow down generator progression, healing, show auras, and speed up actions. There are also numerous killer specific items and add-ons that can help aid you in your game. The variety of killers and their special abilities is definitely the highlight of this game!

One of the biggest challenges I find with DBD is that the maps are unbalanced. The devs have done a lot to mitigate that with blocking certain doors and windows as well as fix "god-loops" for survivor biased maps. In terms of the killer biased maps, there hasn't been any changes to help survivors at maps like Gideon Meat Packing Plant, Rotten Fields, and some maps on Asylum. Just know if you play killer, you will most likely struggle on these maps: Haddonfield-Lampkin Lane, Springwood-Badham Preschool, Anything in the Red Forest, and most places in Macmillion Estate. Survivors will struggle with the maps I mentioned before the killer ones.

The only others cons about this game is that even though it's available on every platform, there's no account transfer or a way to link accounts. When I switched over to PC I had to re-buy all the characters/cosmetics that I had on PS4. EDIT: The game now has crossplay enabled. Besides that there's your typical bugs, but nothing worth mentioning here. All in all DBD is a quick team based game 4v1 that has a simple objective and simple game-play. The variety comes from the characters, maps, perks, and the new stories surrounding DBD in it's entirety. I definitely recommend you try it out, it's worth the price ;)
